backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles with access control, allowing callers to view or save their own profile with admin overrides.
backend/migration.mo: Migration copies userProfiles from the old actor state to the new actor format.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of many frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme color variables and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component wrapping TimerScreen with a theme provider and no authentication.
frontend/src/components/AccountModal.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an account modal component.
frontend/src/components/EventSelector.ts: Dropdown component for selecting a WCA event, driven by WCA_EVENTS metadata.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a login modal component.
frontend/src/components/practice/Practic: Fetches and filters upcoming competitions with search and country filters, allowing users to pick one.
Shows selected event scrambles, navigation, regeneration, and persistence for practice mode.
Controls the multi-step practice flow including competition browsing, event selection, and scramble view.
Loads competition details and lets the user pick an event allowed at that competition.
frontend/src/components/ScramblePanel.ts: Card UI showing the current scramble with a refresh button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/ScrambleVisualiz: Loads and displays a 2D puzzle visualization via cubing.js CDN based on event and scramble.
frontend/src/components/SessionStats.tsx: Card displaying computed session statistics like current, best, ao5, ao12, and mo3.
frontend/src/components/SolveHistory.tsx: Scrollable grid showing solve history entries with formatted times and DNF indicators.
frontend/src/components/TimerDisplay.tsx: Displays the timer UI, formatting time and inspection countdown based on state with pointer event handlers.
frontend/src/components/TimerScreen.tsx: Main timer screen managing event selection, scrambles, solve history, session persistence, and transitions to practice mode.
frontend/src/config/iiOrigins.ts: Defines stable and alternative Internet Identity derivation origins for consistent user principal mapping.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login flow, and exposing identity state.
Generates and cycles through multiple cubing scrambles for an event using cubing.js.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeSessionPer: Persists practice session state in localStorage with load, save, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend query hooks are needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaCompetitionDeta: Fetches and caches details for a specific WCA competition via the WCA API.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaScramble.ts: Generates a single scramble for an event using cubing.js and tracks generation status.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaTimerControls.t: Implements WCA-style timer and inspection logic with audio cues and state transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaUpcomingCompeti: Fetches upcoming WCA competitions and filters out past events.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based theme variables and utility classes for timer and practice UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/inspectionAudio.ts: Provides Web Audio API utilities for playing inspection warning beeps.
frontend/src/lib/sessionCookie.ts: Saves and loads session data in a cookie with basic validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStats.ts: Computes session timing statistics including current, best, mo3, ao5, and ao12 from solve history.
frontend/src/lib/wcaCountries.ts: Resolves country codes to names and extracts unique sorted country entries from competitions.
frontend/src/lib/wcaEvents.ts: Defines WCA event metadata including IDs, names, and scramble event codes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/types/cubing-cdn.d.ts: Type declarations for scramble generation from the cubing.net CDN module.
frontend/src/types/cubing.d.ts: Type definitions for Alg and TwistyPlayer from cubing.net modules.
frontend/src/types/solves.ts: Defines solve entry types and utilities for formatting display and numeric times.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and architectural notes for the WCA practice session app.
